verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> of <S%G1909><s%> the things which we have spoken <S%G3004><s%> this is the sum: <S%G2774><s%> We have <S%G2192><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> a high priest, <S%G749><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is set <S%G2523><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the right hand <S%G1188><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> throne <S%G2362><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Majesty <S%G3172><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> heavens; <S%G3772><s%>

A minister <S%G3011><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> sanctuary, <S%G39><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> true <S%G228><s%> tabernacle, <S%G4633><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> pitched, <S%G4078><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> man. <S%G444><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> high priest <S%G749><s%> is ordained <S%G2525><s%> to offer <S%G4374><s%> <S%G5037><s%> gifts <S%G1435><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sacrifices: <S%G2378><s%> wherefore <S%G3606><s%> it is of necessity <S%G316><s%> that this man <S%G5126><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> somewhat <S%G5100><s%> <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to offer. <S%G4374><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> he <S%G3303><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> earth, <S%G1093><s%> he should not <S%G3761><s%> be <S%G2258><s%> <S%G302><s%> a priest, <S%G2409><s%> seeing that there are <S%G5607><s%> priests <S%G2409><s%> that offer <S%G4374><s%> gifts <S%G1435><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> law: <S%G3551><s%>

Who <S%G3748><s%> serve <S%G3000><s%> unto the example <S%G5262><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shadow <S%G4639><s%> of heavenly things, <S%G2032><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> was admonished of God <S%G5537><s%> when he was about <S%G3195><s%> to make <S%G2005><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> tabernacle: <S%G4633><s%> for, <S%G1063><s%> See, <S%G3708><s%> saith <S%G5346><s%> he, that thou make <S%G4160><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> pattern <S%G5179><s%> showed <S%G1166><s%> to thee <S%G4671><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> mount. <S%G3735><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3570><s%> hath he obtained <S%G5177><s%> a more excellent <S%G1313><s%> ministry, <S%G3009><s%> by how much <S%G3745><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> he is <S%G2076><s%> the mediator <S%G3316><s%> of a better <S%G2909><s%> covenant, <S%G1242><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> was established <S%G3549><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> better <S%G2909><s%> promises. <S%G1860><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> covenant had been <S%G2258><s%> faultless, <S%G273><s%> then should no <S%G3756><s%> <S%G302><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> have been sought <S%G2212><s%> for the second. <S%G1208><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> finding fault <S%G3201><s%> with them, <S%G846><s%> he saith, <S%G3004><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> come, <S%G2064><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> when <S%G2532><s%> I will make <S%G4931><s%> a new <S%G2537><s%> covenant <S%G1242><s%> with <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> of Israel <S%G2474><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> of Judah: <S%G2455><s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> covenant <S%G1242><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> I made <S%G4160><s%> with their <S%G846><s%> fathers <S%G3962><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> when I <S%G3450><s%> took <S%G1949><s%> them <S%G846><s%> by the <S%G3588><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> to lead <S%G1806><s%> them <S%G846><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%> of Egypt; <S%G125><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they <S%G846><s%> continued <S%G1696><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> covenant, <S%G1242><s%> and I <S%G2504><s%> regarded them not, <S%G272><s%> <S%G846><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is the <S%G3588><s%> covenant <S%G1242><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> I will make <S%G1303><s%> with the <S%G3588><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> of Israel <S%G2474><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> the Lord; <S%G2962><s%> I will put <S%G1325><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> laws <S%G3551><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> their <S%G846><s%> mind, <S%G1271><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> write <S%G1924><s%> them <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> their <S%G846><s%> hearts: <S%G2588><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I will be <S%G2071><s%> to them <S%G846><s%> a <S%G1519><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G846><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> to me <S%G3427><s%> a <S%G1519><s%> people: <S%G2992><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they shall not <S%G3364><s%> teach <S%G1321><s%> every man <S%G1538><s%> his <S%G848><s%> neighbor, <S%G4139><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> every man <S%G1538><s%> his <S%G848><s%> brother, <S%G80><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Know <S%G1097><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord: <S%G2962><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> shall know <S%G1492><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the least <S%G3398><s%> <S%G846><s%> to <S%G2193><s%> the greatest. <S%G3173><s%> <S%G846><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> I will be <S%G2071><s%> merciful <S%G2436><s%> to their <S%G846><s%> unrighteousness, <S%G93><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> sins <S%G266><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> iniquities <S%G458><s%> will I remember <S%G3415><s%> no more. <S%G3364><s%> <S%G2089><s%>

In that he saith, <S%G3004><s%> A new <S%G2537><s%> covenant, he hath made the first old. <S%G3822><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4413><s%> Now <S%G1161><s%> that which decayeth <S%G3822><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> waxeth old <S%G1095><s%> is ready to vanish away. <S%G1451><s%> <S%G854><s%>
